title: automation will assume these roles
extract: Automation is the art of making processes or machines self-acting or self-moving. Automation also means the technique of making a device, machine, process, or procedure more fully automatic. ... Decisions associated with automation are usually concerned with some or all of these economic and social considerations.Dec 26, 2018
